original_title: 真　累が淵（かさねがふち）
overview: In an ordinary household in Metropolis, the housewife committed suicide two years ago. Since then, the male host Akihiko married a non-faithful lover Yizi to get started. In the newly reorganized happy home, only the little girl, Yuxi, is depressed...
title: 真　累が淵（かさねがふち）
